game.name: LOST & FOUND
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 협동, 온라인 협동, Steam 도전 과제, 캡션 이용 가능, 음량 개별 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 스테레오 사운드, 자막 옵션, Steam Cloud, Steam 순위표
game.shortDescription: LOST & FOUND is a free to play dynamic sorting game. Match forms to the right items and build your own warehouse, or compete with your friends in multiplayer mode after your shift is over.
game.shortDescriptionEn: LOST & FOUND is a free to play dynamic sorting game. Match forms to the right items and build your own warehouse, or compete with your friends in multiplayer mode after your shift is over.
